<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Dismissal Note Requirement</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/alert/dismiss/require_dismissal_note"}></MethodEndpoint>



Manages whether or not a user must provide a reason (dismissal note) when dismissing an alert on the Prisma Cloud platform.

## Request
